pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a tall building against a backdrop of a sunset sky, with the camera moving closer to the building. As the camera progresses, more details of the building's facade, including windows and balconies, become visible. The camera continues to move upward, revealing more of the building's structure and the surrounding cityscape. The video concludes with a close-up view of the building's upper floors, showing the balconies and the people standing on one of the balconies.
